Posts.EditableText: Okay guys and gals, it's time to unveil my first ever effort at creating a game: http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review.php?game=330 It's somewhat different to other Quest games I've seen, relying heavily on the use of timers and menus rather than objects and rooms. Taken ages and ages to get right. Not sure how playable it is, in all honesty I worked out how the simulation runs by itself before I sussed out how the player would interact with it, and I fear that kind of shows. Anyways, I will be grateful for any suggestions or feedback.
Posts.HTML:
Okay guys and gals, it's time to unveil my first ever effort at creating a game:

http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review.php?game=330

It's somewhat different to other Quest games I've seen, relying heavily on the use of timers and menus rather than objects and rooms. Taken ages and ages to get right. Not sure how playable it is, in all honesty I worked out how the simulation runs by itself before I sussed out how the player would interact with it, and I fear that kind of shows. Anyways, I will be grateful for any suggestions or feedback.
